prompts.title: Policy Number
prompts.prompt: What is the policy number mentioned in this document?

prompts.title: Insurer Name
prompts.prompt: Who is the insurance company or insurer for this policy?

prompts.title: Policyholder
prompts.prompt: Who is the policyholder or insured party named in the document?

prompts.title: Effective Date
prompts.prompt: What is the effective date of the policy?

prompts.title: Expiration Date
prompts.prompt: What is the expiration or end date of the policy?

prompts.title: Coverage Type
prompts.prompt: What is the main coverage type or line of insurance for this policy?

prompts.title: Policy Form
prompts.prompt: What policy form number or form name is referenced in this document?

prompts.title: Currency
prompts.prompt: What currency is used in this insurance policy?

prompts.title: Total Premium
prompts.prompt: What is the total premium amount listed?

prompts.title: Limit Amount
prompts.prompt: What is the coverage limit mentioned in the policy?

prompts.title: Deductible / Retention
prompts.prompt: What is the deductible or retention amount specified in the document?

prompts.title: Underwriter
prompts.prompt: Who is the underwriter or underwriting company for this policy?

prompts.title: Broker / Agent
prompts.prompt: Who is the broker or agent listed on the insurance document?

prompts.title: Quote Date
prompts.prompt: What is the quote date or issue date for this insurance policy?

prompts.title: Policy Jurisdiction
prompts.prompt: What jurisdiction or governing law applies to this policy?

prompts.title: Claim Contact
prompts.prompt: Who is the claim contact or department to reach for claims?

prompts.title: Beneficiary
prompts.prompt: Who is listed as the beneficiary in the policy?

prompts.title: Form Edition / Date
prompts.prompt: What is the form edition or revision date mentioned?
